themes: historic cultural bias in Austin arts funding
lack of inclusivity in major arts organizations
resource disparities between large and small/culturally specific groups
key_phrases: the rubric that was developed by many focus groups and strategic planning sessions
blatant cultural bias arts groups have faced in Austin for so long
Ballet Austin, the Opera and Austin Film Festival will be fine - they have benefitted from that bias for 30-40 years
failed to create environments of inclusivity amongst their staff and audiences
groups like Ballet East, The Vortex or Cine Las Americas, AGLIFF and the Austin Asian American International Film Festivals - which did this with a lot less money and resources
mentioned_programs: Austin Asian American International Film Festivals
barriers_identified: lack of inclusivity in major arts organizations
solutions_proposed: protect and preserve the equity-focused funding rubric developed by community input
allow the rubric to continue its intended work to address bias
